gb.cost: £41/month for Sky Sports, £25/month for BT Sport
gb.additionalInfo: Sky Sports and BT Sport share most live matches. Amazon shows select matches. BBC shows highlights on Match of the Day.

us.additionalInfo: NBC holds exclusive rights. Matches split between NBC, USA Network, and Peacock streaming.

ca.additionalInfo: DAZN holds exclusive rights to all Premier League matches in Canada.

au.additionalInfo: Optus Sport has exclusive rights to all Premier League matches in Australia.

in.additionalInfo: Star Sports broadcasts select matches on TV. All matches available on Disney+ Hotstar.

fr.additionalInfo: Canal+ and RMC Sport share broadcasting rights in France.

de.additionalInfo: Sky Deutschland holds exclusive rights to Premier League matches in Germany.

es.additionalInfo: DAZN holds exclusive rights to Premier League matches in Spain.

br.additionalInfo: ESPN Brasil broadcasts select matches on TV. All matches available on Star+ streaming.

mx.additionalInfo: Sky Sports broadcasts select matches on TV. Paramount+ offers streaming of all matches.

cn.additionalInfo: iQIYI Sports holds exclusive digital rights for Premier League in China.

jp.additionalInfo: DAZN holds exclusive rights to all Premier League matches in Japan.

nl.additionalInfo: Viaplay holds exclusive rights to Premier League matches in the Netherlands.

se.additionalInfo: Viaplay holds exclusive rights to Premier League matches in Sweden.

no.additionalInfo: TV2 holds exclusive rights to Premier League matches in Norway.

dk.additionalInfo: Viaplay holds exclusive rights to Premier League matches in Denmark.

za.additionalInfo: SuperSport holds exclusive rights to Premier League matches in South Africa.

ae.additionalInfo: beIN Sports holds exclusive rights to Premier League matches in the UAE and across the Middle East and North Africa region.

sg.additionalInfo: Both StarHub and Singtel offer Premier League matches in Singapore.

th.cost: THB 499/month for True Premier Football HD
th.additionalInfo: True Visions holds the rights to broadcast Premier League matches in Thailand.

eg.additionalInfo: beIN Sports holds exclusive rights to Premier League matches in Egypt and across the Middle East and North Africa region.

kr.additionalInfo: SPOTV holds the rights to broadcast Premier League matches in South Korea.

tr.additionalInfo: beIN Sports holds exclusive rights to Premier League matches in Turkey.

ru.additionalInfo: Okko Sport holds the rights to broadcast Premier League matches in Russia.
